Name: Simple Asterleeds Pot Lv.1
Description: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description$english: Recommend: Stormblade, Wind Knight, Heavy Guardian, Marksman, and Shield Knight.
Description2$english: The Aster Pot is a classic family dish from Asterleeds, originally a simple fish stew... but what other ingredients to add for authenticity has been a long-standing debate. This Simple Asterleeds Pot emphasizes the pure deliciousness of the fish. It is said that the pure fish flavor can bring tears to the eyes of long-absent wanderers.

recipes.Name: Simple Asterleeds Pot
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Asterleeds' Pot is a classic Asterleeds family dish, based on a simple fish stew... but which additional ingredients make it truly authentic remains a never-ending debate. The Asterleeds rustic pot allows the fish's pure, unadulterated essence to shine— its flavor so evocative, it's said to bring tears to wanderers longing for the taste of home.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Asterleeds' Pot is a classic Asterleeds family dish, based on a simple fish stew... but which additional ingredients make it truly authentic remains a never-ending debate. The Asterleeds rustic pot allows the fish's pure, unadulterated essence to shine— its flavor so evocative, it's said to bring tears to wanderers longing for the taste of home.

NeedMaterial.Name: Premium Fish Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Finely processed fresh Fish Meat, retaining only the essence of the fish's tenderness through exquisite knife work, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a gourmet delicacy.

recipes.Name: Premium Fish Meat - Beginner
recipes.Des:
Can process fish you caught into Premium Fish Meat that can be used as high-grade ingredients.
This process yields 7-8 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process fish you caught into Premium Fish Meat that can be used as high-grade ingredients.
This process yields 7-8 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.
Increasing the Season Pass level allows you to claim generous rewards.
NeedMaterial.Description$english:
Earned by completing activity goals. When Season Pass EXP reaches a certain level, the Season Pass level can be increased.
Increasing the Season Pass level allows you to claim generous rewards.

NeedMaterial.Name: Season Pass EXP (Not counted toward weekly limit)
NeedMaterial.Name$english: Season Pass EXP (Not counted toward weekly limit)
NeedMaterial.Description:
Earned by completing daily activity goals. Once enough EXP is accumulated, your Season Pass level increases.
Higher Season Pass levels grant generous rewards.
Season Pass EXP earned does not count toward the weekly limit.

Earned by completing daily activity goals. Once enough EXP is accumulated, your Season Pass level increases.
Higher Season Pass levels grant generous rewards.
Season Pass EXP earned does not count toward the weekly limit.

NeedMaterial.Name: Asterscad
NeedMaterial.Description: This is a fish. In Asterleeds, some fish have delicious meat and are often made into tasty seafood dishes. Of course, there are also some highly ornamental fish, so Guild merchants also collect them.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: This is a fish. In Asterleeds, some fish have delicious meat and are often made into tasty seafood dishes. Of course, there are also some highly ornamental fish, so Guild merchants also collect them.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: It is said that some fishing enthusiasts even dismantle their houses just to build a large aquarium to display and show off their collection of these treasures.
